summary.span: 在表中显示来自数据源的单条记录的值，其中每个数据行表示该记录的一个字段。

span.span: Displays the values of a single record from a data source in a table, where each data row represents a field of the record.

summary.span: 使用 控件可以编辑、删除和插入记录。

span.span: The control allows you to edit, delete, and insert records.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [行字段Row Fields](#row_fields) - [绑定到数据Binding to Data](#binding_to_data) - [安全性Security](#security) - [数据操作Data Operations](#data_operations) - [自定义用户界面Customizing the User Interface](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [事件Events](#events) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件用于在表中显示数据源中的单个记录, 其中记录的每个字段都显示在表的一行中。The control is used to display a single record from a data source in a table, where each field of the record is displayed in a row of the table. 它可与控件一起用于主-从方案。It can be used in combination with a control for master-detail scenarios. 控件支持以下功能:The control supports the following features: - 绑定到数据源控件, 如。Binding to data source controls, such as . - 内置插入功能。Built-in inserting capabilities. - 内置的更新和删除功能。Built-in updating and deleting capabilities. - 内置的分页功能。Built-in paging capabilities. - 以编程方式访问对象模型, 以动态设置属性、处理事件等。Programmatic access to the object model to dynamically set properties, handle events, and so on. - 通过主题和样式自定义外观。Customizable appearance through themes and styles. ## 行字段Row Fields 控件中的每个数据行都是通过声明字段控件创建的。Each data row in the control is created by declaring a field control. 不同的行字段类型确定控件中行的行为。Different row field types determine the behavior of the rows in the control. 字段控件派生自。Field controls derive from . 下表列出了可以使用的不同行字段类型。The following table lists the different row field types that can be used. |列字段类型Column field type|说明Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| ||以文本形式显示数据源中字段的值。Displays the value of a field in a data source as text.| ||在控件中显示命令按钮。Displays a command button in the control. 这允许您显示具有自定义按钮控件的行, 如 "添加" 或 "移除" 按钮。This allows you to display a row with a custom button control, such as an Add or a Remove button.| ||在控件中显示复选框。Displays a check box in the control. 此行字段类型通常用于显示具有布尔值的字段。This row field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.| ||显示内置命令按钮, 用于在控件中执行编辑、插入或删除操作。Displays built-in command buttons to perform edit, insert, or delete operations in the control.| ||将数据源中的字段值显示为超链接。Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink. 此行字段类型允许您将第二个字段绑定到超链接的 URL。This row field type allows you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.| ||在控件中显示图像。Displays an image in the control.| ||根据指定的模板, 在控件中显示行的用户定义内容。Displays user-defined content for a row in the control according to a specified template. 此行字段类型允许您创建自定义行字段。This row field type allows you to create a custom row field.| 默认情况下, 属性设置为`true`, 这将为数据源中的可绑定类型的每个字段自动生成一个绑定行字段对象。By default, the property is set to `true`, which automatically generates a bound row field object for each field of a bindable type in the data source. 有效的可绑定类型为、 、、和基元类型集。Valid bindable types are , , , , and the set of primitive types. 然后, 每个字段在行中显示为文本, 并按照每个字段在数据源中的显示顺序显示。Each field is then displayed in a row as text, in the order in which each field appears in the data source. 自动生成行可提供一种快速简单的方法来显示记录中的每个字段。Automatically generating the rows provides a quick and easy way to display every field in the record. 但是, 若要使用控件的高级功能, 必须显式声明要包含在控件中的行字段。However, to make use of the control's advanced capabilities you must explicitly declare the row fields to include in the control. 若要声明行字段, 请首先将属性设置`false`为。To declare the row fields, first set the property to `false`. 接下来, 在`` 控件的开始标记和结束标记之间添加开始标记和结束标记。Next, add opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 最后, 列出要在开始标记和结束``标记之间包括的行字段。Finally, list the row fields that you want to include between the opening and closing `` tags. 指定的行字段将按所列顺序添加到集合中。The row fields specified are added to the collection in the order listed. 集合允许您以编程方式管理控件中的行字段。 The collection allows you to programmatically manage the row fields in the control. > [!NOTE] > 自动生成的行字段不会添加到集合中。Automatically generated row fields are not added to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 显式声明的行字段可与自动生成的行字段一起显示。Explicitly declared row fields can be displayed in combination with automatically generated row fields. 如果同时使用这两种方法, 将首先呈现显式声明的行字段, 然后呈现自动生成的行字段。When both are used, explicitly declared row fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated row fields. ## 绑定到数据Binding to Data 控件可以绑定到数据源控件 (如控件或控件) 或实现该接口的任何数据源集合, 如、、 或其他集合类型。The control can be bound to a data source control (such as the control or control) or to any data source collection that implements the interface, such as , , , or other collection types. 使用以下方法之一将控件绑定到相应的数据源类型:Use one of the following methods to bind the control to the appropriate data source type: - 若要绑定到数据源控件, 请将 控件的属性设置为数据源控件的值。To bind to a data source control, set the property of the control to the value of the data source control. 控件将自动绑定到指定的数据源控件。The control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 这是绑定到数据的首选方法。This is the preferred method to bind to data. - 若要绑定到实现接口的数据源, 请以编程方式将控件的属性设置为数据源, 然后调用方法。To bind to a data source that implements the interface, programmatically set the property of the control to the data source and then call the method. 有关数据绑定的详细信息, 请参阅[绑定到数据库](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information on data binding, see [Binding to Databases](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). ## 安全性Security 此控件可用于显示用户输入, 其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前, 请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[验证服务器控制语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## 数据操作Data Operations 控件提供内置功能, 使用户可以对控件中的项进行更新、删除、插入和分页。The control provides built-in capabilities that allow the user to update, delete, insert, and page through items in the control. 当控件绑定到数据源控件时 , 控件可以利用数据源控件的功能, 并提供自动更新、删除、插入和分页功能。 When the control is bound to a data source control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating, deleting, inserting, and paging functionality. > [!NOTE] > 控件可以为与其他类型的数据源的更新、删除、插入和分页操作提供支持; 但是, 必须在相应的事件处理程序中提供这些操作的实现。The control can provide support for update, delete, insert, and paging operations with other types of data sources; however, you must provide the implementation for these operations in an appropriate event handler. 有关详细信息，请参阅、和。For more information, see , , and . 控件可以将、或属性分别`true`设置为, 从而自动添加具有 "编辑"、"删除" 或 "新建" 按钮的行字段。 The control can automatically add a row field with an Edit, Delete, or New button by setting the , , or properties to `true`, respectively. 与 "删除" 按钮 (它会立即删除所选的记录) 不同, 单击 "编辑" 或 " 新建" 按钮时, 控件将分别进入 "编辑" 或 "插入" 模式。Unlike the Delete button (which deletes the selected record immediately), when the Edit or New button is clicked, the control goes into edit or insert mode, respectively. 在编辑模式下, "编辑" 按钮将替换为更新和 "取消" 按钮。In edit mode, the Edit button is replaced with an Update and a Cancel button. 与字段的数据类型 (如 或控件) 对应的输入控件以用户要修改的字段值显示。Input controls that are appropriate for the field's data type (such as a or a control) are displayed with a field's value for the user to modify. 单击 "更新" 按钮将更新数据源中的记录, 而单击 "取消" 按钮将放弃所有更改。Clicking the Update button updates the record in the data source, while clicking the Cancel button abandons any changes. 同样, 在插入模式下, "新建" 按钮将被替换为 "插入" 和 "取消" 按钮, 并为用户显示空输入控件以输入新记录的值。Likewise, in insert mode, the New button is replaced with an Insert and a Cancel button, and empty input controls are displayed for the user to enter the values for the new record. > [!NOTE] > 您还可以在、 或行字段中手动定义更新、删除和插入命令按钮。You can also manually define the update, delete, and insert command buttons in a , , or row field. 控件识别属性设置为 "编辑"、"更新"、"删除"、"新建"、"插入" 或 "取消" 的按钮; 但是, 您仍然必须自行提供此功能。 The control recognizes buttons with the property set to "Edit", "Update", "Delete", "New", "Insert", or "Cancel"; however, you still must provide the functionality yourself. 有关详细信息，请参阅、和。For more information, see , , and . 控件提供分页功能, 该功能允许用户导航到数据源中的其他记录。The control provides a paging feature, which allows the user to navigate to other records in the data source. 启用后, 页面导航控件将显示在页导航行中。When enabled, page navigation controls are displayed in a pager row. 若要启用分页, 请将属性`true`设置为。To enable paging, set the property to `true`. 使用 和属性可以自定义页导航行。The pager row can be customized using the and properties. ## 自定义用户界面Customizing the User Interface 您可以通过设置控件的不同部分的样式属性来自定义控件的外观。You can customize the appearance of the control by setting the style properties for different parts of the control. 下表列出了可以设置的样式属性。The following table lists the style properties that you can set. |Style 属性Style property|说明Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||控件中的交替数据行的样式设置。The style settings for the alternating data rows in the control. 设置此属性时, 数据行将以带区显示, 在设置和设置之间交替。When this property is set, the data rows are displayed in bands, alternating between the settings and the settings.| ||包含内置命令按钮的行的样式设置。The style settings for the row that contains the built-in command buttons.| ||控件处于编辑模式时数据行的样式设置。The style settings for the data rows when the control is in edit mode.| ||当数据源不包含任何记录时, 控件中显示的空数据行的样式设置。The style settings for the empty data row that are displayed in the control when the data source does not contain any records.| ||脚注行的样式设置。The style settings for the footer row.| ||标题行的样式设置。The style settings for the header row.| ||控件处于插入模式时数据行的样式设置。The style settings for the data rows when the control is in insert mode.| ||页导航行的样式设置。The style settings for the pager row.| ||控件中的数据行的样式设置。The style settings for the data rows in the control. 如果同时设置了属性, 则会在设置和设置之间交替显示数据行。When the property is also set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the settings and the settings.| ||标题列的样式设置。The style settings for the header column.| ## 事件Events 控件提供了几个可对其进行编程的事件。The control provides several events that you can program against. 这使您可以在每次发生事件时运行自定义例程。This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs. 下表列出了控件支持的事件。The following table lists the events supported by the control. 该控件还从其基类继承这些事件: 、、、、、和。 The control also inherits these events from its base classes: , , , , , , and . |事件Event|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||在 控件中单击某个按钮时发生。Occurs when a button is clicked in the control.| ||在控件中创建所有对象之后发生。 Occurs after all objects are created in the control. 此事件通常用于在记录显示之前修改记录的值。This event is often used to modify the values of a record before it is displayed.| ||在单击 "删除" 按钮时, 但在控件从数据源中删除记录之后发生。Occurs when a Delete button is clicked, but after the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用于检查删除操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.| ||在单击 "删除" 按钮时, 但在控件从数据源中删除记录之前发生。Occurs when a Delete button is clicked, but before the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用于取消删除操作。This event is often used to cancel the delete operation.| ||单击 "插入" 按钮时, 但在控件插入记录后发生。Occurs when an Insert button is clicked, but after the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用于检查插入操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the insert operation.| ||当单击 "插入" 按钮时, 但在控件插入记录之前发生。Occurs when an Insert button is clicked, but before the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用于取消插入操作。This event is often used to cancel the insert operation.| ||当单击 "更新" 按钮时, 但在控件更新行后发生。Occurs when an Update button is clicked, but after the control updates the row. 此事件通常用于检查更新操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.| ||当单击 "更新" 按钮时, 但在控件更新记录之前发生。Occurs when an Update button is clicked, but before the control updates the record. 此事件通常用于取消更新操作。This event is often used to cancel the update operation.| ||在控件更改模式 (编辑、插入或只读模式) 后发生。Occurs after the control changes modes (edit, insert, or read-only mode). 此事件通常用于在控件更改模式时执行任务。This event is often used to perform a task when the control changes modes.| ||在控件更改模式 (编辑、插入或只读模式) 之前发生。Occurs before the control changes modes (edit, insert, or read-only mode). 此事件通常用于取消模式更改。This event is often used to cancel a mode change.| ||在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之后发生。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常在用户导航至控件中的其他记录后需要执行任务时使用。This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different record in the control.| ||在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之前发生。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常用于取消分页操作。This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.| ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息, 请参阅[Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用将控件与控件一起用于简单的主-从方案。The following code example demonstrates how to use to use a control in combination with a control for a simple master-detail scenario. 它显示在控件中选定的项的详细信息。It displays the details of an item selected in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewSimple/CS/detailsviewsimplecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewSimple/VB/detailsviewsimplevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件添加、删除和编辑记录。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to add, delete, and edit records. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewComplex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewComplex/CS/detailsviewcomplexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewComplex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewComplex/VB/detailsviewcomplexvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式向控件添加行字段。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively add row fields to the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewRowField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewRowField/CS/detailsviewrowfieldscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewRowField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewRowField/VB/detailsviewrowfieldsvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 若要将控件动态添加到页面, 请创建新的对象, 设置其属性, 然后将其添加到容器控件的集合, 如。To dynamically add a control to a page, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the collection of a container control, such as . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数将控件动态添加到页中。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to dynamically add a control to a page. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件具有内置分页功能, 使用户可以导航到数据源中的其他记录。The control has built-in paging capabilities, which allow a user to navigate to a different record in the data source. 控件既可执行用户界面 (UI), 也可执行数据源分页。The control can perform both user interface (UI) and data source paging. UI 分页功能可用于支持接口的任何数据源对象。The UI paging feature can be used with any data source object that supports the interface. 对于每个分页操作, 控件会在数据源中查询整个数据集合, 并选择要显示的行, 实质上是放弃剩余的数据。For each paging operation, the control queries the data source for the entire data collection and selects the row to display, essentially discarding the remaining data. 如果数据源实现并且属性返回`true`, 则该控件将使用数据源分页而不是 UI 分页。If a data source implements and the property returns `true`, the control will use data source paging instead of UI paging. 在这种情况下 , 该控件将仅查询每个分页操作所需的行。In this case, the control will query for only the row needed for each paging operation. 因此, 数据源分页比 UI 分页更有效。Thus, data source paging is more efficient than UI paging. 仅对象不支持修改数据源分页。Only the object supports data source paging without modification. 若要启用分页功能, 请将属性设置`true`为。To enable the paging feature, set the property to `true`. 可以通过使用属性来确定基础数据源中的总项数。You can determine the total number of items in the underlying data source by using the property. 若要确定当前显示项的索引, 请使用属性。To determine the index of the currently displayed item, use the property. 启用分页时, 会自动在控件中显示一个名为 "页导航行" 的附加行。When paging is enabled, an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 页导航行包含页面导航控件, 可以显示在控件的顶部和底部, 或者同时显示在控件的顶部和底部。The pager row contains the page navigation controls and can be displayed at the top, bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 页导航行有两个内置的页导航显示模式: 编号页和下一页链接 (默认值)。The pager row has two built-in pager display modes: numbered pages and next and previous page links (default). 页码页面模式显示各个页面的链接, 使用户可以导航到特定页面。The numbered pages mode displays links for the individual pages, allowing the user to navigate to a specific page. "下一步" 和 "上一链接" 模式显示允许用户导航到下一页或上一页的控件。The next and previous links mode displays controls that allow the user to navigate to the next or the previous page. > [!NOTE] > 当数据源包含的记录少于两条时, 控件将自动隐藏页导航行。The control automatically hides the pager row when the data source contains fewer than two records. 通过使用属性, 可以控制页导航行的设置 (如页导航显示模式、一次显示的页链接的数目以及页导航控件的文本标签)。You can control the settings of the pager row (such as the pager display mode, the number of page links to display at a time, and the pager control's text label) by using the property. 若要控制页导航行的外观 (包括其背景色、字体颜色和位置), 请使用属性。To control the appearance of the pager row (including its background color, font color, and position), use the property. 控件还允许您为页导航行定义自定义模板。The control also allows you to define a custom template for the pager row. 有关创建自定义页导航行模板的详细信息, 请参阅。For more information on creating a custom pager row template, see . 控件提供若干事件, 可用于在进行分页时执行自定义操作。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when paging occurs. 下表列出了可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |事件Event|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之后发生。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常在用户导航至控件中的其他记录后需要执行任务时使用。This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different record in the control.| ||在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之前发生。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常用于取消分页操作。This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.| 的值存储在视图状态中。The value of is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性启用控件的分页功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to enable the paging capabilities of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAllowPaging/CS/detailsviewallowpagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAllowPaging/VB/detailsviewallowpagingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可控制控件中交替数据行的外观。 Use the property to control the appearance of alternating data rows in a control. 如果设置此属性, 则在设置和设置之间交替显示数据行。When this property is set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the settings and the settings. 此属性是只读的;但是, 您可以设置它返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. `Property-Subproperty`可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性, 其中`Subproperty` 是对象的一个属性 (例如`AlternatingRowStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `AlternatingRowStyle-ForeColor`). 还可以在窗体`Property.Subproperty`中以编程方式设置属性 ( `AlternatingRowStyle.ForeColor`例如)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `AlternatingRowStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置通常包括自定义背景色、前景色和字体属性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定控件中的交替数据行的字体和样式设置。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the font and style settings for the alternating data rows in the control. value.span: 表示显示用来删除当前记录的内置控件；否则为 。

span.span: to display the built-in control to delete the current record; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true` 当控件绑定到从继承的对象并返回属性时, 控件可以利用数据源控件的功能并提供自动正在删除功能。When a control is bound to an object that inherits from and the property returns `true`, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic deleting functionality. > [!NOTE] > 对于要删除数据的 对象,必须使用 delete 查询语句设置基础对象的属性。 For a object to delete data, the property of the underlying object must be set with a delete query statement. 当属性设置为`true`时, 将在 控件中自动显示带有 "删除" 按钮的行字段。 When the property is set to `true`, a row field with a Delete button is automatically displayed in the control. 单击 "删除" 按钮将从数据源中永久删除该记录。Clicking the Delete button permanently removes that record from the data source. > [!NOTE] > 还必须将 "自动删除" 功能的属性设置为 "工作"。You must also set the property for the automatic deletion feature to work. 控件提供若干事件, 可用于在删除记录时执行自定义操作。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a record is deleted. 下表列出了可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |事件Event|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||在单击 "删除" 按钮时, 但在控件从数据源中删除记录之后发生。Occurs when the Delete button is clicked, but after the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用于检查删除操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.| ||在单击 "删除" 按钮时, 但在控件从数据源中删除记录之前发生。Occurs when the Delete button is clicked, but before the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用于取消删除操作。This event is often used to cancel the delete operation.| 的值存储在视图状态中。The value of is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示用于删除当前记录的内置控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the built-in control to delete the current record. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewAutoGenerateDeleteButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAutoGenerateDeleteButton/CS/detailsviewautogeneratedeletebuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewAutoGenerateDeleteButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAutoGenerateDeleteButton/VB/detailsviewautogeneratedeletebuttonvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当支持更新的数据源控件绑定到控件时, 该控件可以利用数据源控件的功能并提供自动更新功能。When a data source control that supports updating is bound to a control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating functionality. > [!NOTE] > 对于用于更新数据的数据源控件, 必须使用 update 查询语句设置其属性。For a data source control to update data, its property must be set with an update query statement. 当属性设置为`true`时, 将在 控件中自动显示带有 "编辑" 按钮的行字段。 When the property is set to `true`, a row field with an Edit button is automatically displayed in the control. 单击 "编辑" 按钮会将该控件置于编辑模式。Clicking the Edit button puts that control in edit mode. 处于编辑模式时, 控件中不是只读的每个绑定字段都会显示相应的输入控件 ( 如控件) 作为字段的数据类型。When in edit mode, each bound field in the control that is not read-only displays the appropriate input control, such as a control, for the field's data type. 这允许用户修改字段的值。This allows the user to modify the field's value. 单击 "编辑" 按钮后, 还会将其替换为 "更新" 按钮和 "取消" 按钮。When clicked, the Edit button is also replaced with an Update button and a Cancel button. 单击 "更新" 按钮可使用任何值更改更新数据源中的记录, 并将该控件返回到由属性指定的模式。Clicking the Update button updates the record in the data source with any value changes and returns the control to the mode specified by the property. 单击 "取消" 按钮将放弃任何值更改, 并将控件返回到默认模式。Clicking the Cancel button abandons any value changes and returns the control to the default mode. > [!NOTE] > 若要以编程方式将控件置于编辑模式, 请使用方法。To put a control in edit mode programmatically, use the method. 当属性设置为`true`时, 控件将自动确保在属性中指定的一个或多个字段是只读的。 When the property is also set to `true`, the control automatically ensures that the field or fields specified in the property are read-only. > [!NOTE] > 除非您实现自己的更新功能, 否则必须将自动更新功能的属性设置为 "工作"。Unless you implement your own updating functionality, you must set the property for the automatic updating feature to work. 当控件处于编辑模式时, 可以使用属性控制数据行的外观。You can control the appearance of the data rows when the control is in edit mode by using the property. 常见设置通常包括自定义背景色、前景色和字体属性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. 控件提供若干事件, 可用于在更新记录时执行自定义操作。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a record is updated. 下表列出了可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |事件Event|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||在单击 "更新" 按钮时, 但在控件更新记录后发生。Occurs when the Update button is clicked, but after the control updates the record. 此事件通常用于检查更新操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.| ||在单击 "更新" 按钮时, 但在控件更新记录之前发生。Occurs when the Update button is clicked, but before the control updates the record. 此事件通常用于取消更新操作。This event is often used to cancel the update operation.| ||在控件更改模式之后发生。Occurs after the control changes modes.| ||在控件更改模式之前发生。Occurs before the control changes modes. 此事件通常用于取消模式更改。This event is often used to cancel the mode change.| 的值存储在视图状态中。The value of is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示用于编辑当前记录的内置控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the built-in controls to edit the current record. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewAutoGenerateEditButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAutoGenerateEditButton/CS/detailsviewautogenerateeditbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewAutoGenerateEditButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAutoGenerateEditButton/VB/detailsviewautogenerateeditbuttonvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当支持插入的数据源控件绑定到控件时, 该控件可以利用数据源控件的功能并提供自动插入功能。When a data source control that supports inserting is bound to a control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic inserting functionality. > [!NOTE] > 对于要插入数据的数据源控件, 必须使用 insert 查询语句设置其属性。For a data source control to insert data, its property must be set with an insert query statement. 当属性设置为`true`时, 将在 控件中自动显示带有 "新建" 按钮的行字段。 When the property is set to `true`, a row field with a New button is automatically displayed in the control. 单击 "新建" 按钮会将该控件置于插入模式下。Clicking the New button puts that control in insert mode. 处于插入模式时, 控件中不是只读的每个绑定字段都会显示适当的输入控件 (如控件) 作为字段的数据类型。When in insert mode, each bound field in the control that is not read-only displays the appropriate input control, such as a control, for the field's data type. 这允许用户为新记录输入字段的值。This allows the user to enter the field's value for the new record. 单击 "新建" 按钮时, 还会将其替换为 "插入" 按钮和 "取消" 按钮。When clicked, the New button is also replaced with an Insert button and a Cancel button. 单击 "插入" 按钮会在数据源中插入新记录, 并将该控件返回到由属性指定的模式。Clicking the Insert button inserts the new record in the data source and returns the control to the mode specified by the property. 单击 "取消" 按钮将放弃插入操作, 并将控件返回到默认模式。Clicking the Cancel button abandons the insert operation and returns the control to the default mode. > [!NOTE] > 若要以编程方式将一行置于插入模式, 请使用方法。To put a row in insert mode programmatically, use the method. 您可以使用属性控制处于插入模式的记录的外观。You can control the appearance of a record that is in insert mode by using the property. 常见设置通常包括自定义背景色、前景色和字体属性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. 控件提供若干事件, 可用于在插入新记录时执行自定义操作。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a new record is inserted. 下表列出了可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |事件Event|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||单击 "插入" 按钮时, 但在控件插入记录后发生。Occurs when the Insert button is clicked, but after the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用于检查插入操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the insert operation.| ||在单击 "插入" 按钮时, 但在控件插入记录之前发生。Occurs when the Insert button is clicked, but before the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用于取消插入操作。This event is often used to cancel the insert operation.| ||在控件更改模式之后发生。Occurs after the control changes modes.| ||在控件更改模式之前发生。Occurs before the control changes modes. 此事件通常用于取消模式更改。This event is often used to cancel the mode change.| 的值存储在视图状态中。The value of is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示内置控件, 以便在控件中插入新记录。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the built-in controls to insert a new record in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewAutoGenerateInsertButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAutoGenerateInsertButton/CS/detailsviewautogenerateinsertbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewAutoGenerateInsertButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAutoGenerateInsertButton/VB/detailsviewautogenerateinsertbuttonvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示对应于数据源中每个字段的行字段是否自动生成并在 控件中显示。

span.span: to display automatically generated bound row fields for each field in the data source; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件中的每个数据行都用行字段表示。Each data row in the control is represented by a row field. 当属性设置为`true`时, 将为数据源中的每个字段创建自动生成的绑定行字段。 When the property is set to `true`, an automatically generated bound row field is created for each field in the data source. 然后, 每个字段在行中显示为文本, 并按照每个字段在数据源中的显示顺序显示。Each field is then displayed in a row as text, in the order in which each field appears in the data source. > [!NOTE] > 自动生成的绑定行字段不会添加到集合中。Automatically generated bound row fields are not added to the collection. 自动生成行可提供一种快速简单的方法来显示记录中的每个字段。Automatically generating the rows provides a quick and easy way to display every field in the record. 但是, 若要使用控件的高级功能, 必须显式声明要包含在控件中的行字段。However, to make use of the control's advanced capabilities you must explicitly declare the row fields to include in the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . > [!NOTE] > 显式声明的行字段可与自动生成的行字段结合使用。Explicitly declared row fields can be used in combination with automatically generated row fields. 如果同时使用这两种方法, 将首先呈现显式声明的行字段, 然后呈现自动生成的行字段。When both are used, explicitly declared row fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated row fields. 的值存储在视图状态中。The value of is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性为数据源中的每个字段自动创建绑定行字段。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to automatically create bound row fields for each field in the data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewAutoGenerateRows#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAutoGenerateRows/CS/detailsviewautogeneraterowscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewAutoGenerateRows#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAutoGenerateRows/VB/detailsviewautogeneraterowsvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用分页时 (通过将属性设置为`true`), 会自动在控件中显示一个名为 "页导航行" 的附加行。When paging is enabled (by setting the property to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 页导航行包含的控件允许用户导航到其他记录, 并且可以显示在控件的顶部和底部, 或者同时显示在控件的顶部和底部。The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to other records, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 使用属性以编程方式访问表示控件中的底部页导航行的对象。 Use the property to programmatically access the object that represents the bottom pager row in the control. > [!NOTE] > 只有 控件在事件中创建了底部页导航行后, 属性才可用。The property is available only after the control creates the bottom pager row in the event. 当你需要以编程方式操作底部页导航行时 (例如, 添加自定义内容时), 通常会使用此属性。This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the bottom pager row, for example when adding custom content. 在 呈现控件之后, 必须对属性进行任何修改; 否则,控件将覆盖所有更改。Any modification to the property must be performed after the control has been rendered; otherwise, the control will overwrite any changes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性在事件期间访问控件的底部页导航行。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the bottom pager row of the control during the event. 然后 , 将用当前页码和总页数更新自定义页导航行中的两个控件。Two controls within the custom pager row are then updated with the current page number and total number of pages. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可控制单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的间距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填充量将添加到单元格的四个边。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 控件的同一列中的所有单元格都具有相同的宽度。All cells in the same column of a control have the same width. 填充量适用于最宽的单元格, 列中的所有其他单元格都将调整为该单元格的宽度。The padding amount is applied to the widest cell and all other cells in the column are adjusted to that cell width. 同样, 同一行中的所有单元格都具有相同的高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row have the same height. 填充量适用于行中最高的单元格, 该行中的所有其他单元格都将调整为该单元格的高度。The padding amount is applied to the tallest cell in the row and all other cells in the row are adjusted to that cell height. 无法指定单个单元大小。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. 若要调整单元格之间的间距, 请使用属性。To adjust the spacing between cells, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的间距大小。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the amount of spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可确定控件是处于编辑、插入还是只读模式。 Use the property to determine whether the control is in edit, insert, or read-only mode. 下表列出了不同的模式值。The following table lists the different mode values. |模式Mode|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| |`DetailsViewMode.Edit`|控件处于编辑模式, 这允许用户更新记录的值。The control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`DetailsViewMode.Insert`|控件处于插入模式, 这允许用户向数据源添加新记录。The control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly`|控件处于只读模式, 这是正常的显示模式。The control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.| 单击 "新建"、"更新" 、"插入"、"删除" 或 "取消" 命令按钮时, 控件通常会自动设置此值。This value is normally set automatically by the control by when the New, Update, Insert, Delete, or Cancel command button is clicked. 你还可以使用方法以编程方式更改模式。You can also programmatically change the mode by using the method. 当控件更改模式时, 将引发下表中的事件。When the control changes modes, the events in the following table are raised. 这允许您创建一个自定义事件处理程序, 该处理程序在发生事件时执行例程。This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a routine when the event occurs. |事件Event|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||当单击更改控件模式的命令按钮时, 但在模式更改之后发生。Occurs when a command button that changes the mode of the control is clicked, but after the mode changes.| ||当单击更改控件模式的命令按钮时, 但在模式更改之前发生。Occurs when a command button that changes the mode of the control is clicked, but before the mode changes.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定控件是处于编辑、插入还是只读模式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether the control is in edit, insert, or read-only mode. 如果用户在控件处于编辑模式时尝试导航到另一条记录, 则会取消分页操作。If the user attempts to navigate to a different record while the control is in edit mode, the paging operation is canceled. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewCurrentMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCurrentMode/CS/detailsviewcurrentmodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewCurrentMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCurrentMode/VB/detailsviewcurrentmodevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定以逗号分隔的字段名称列表, 这些字段名称表示数据源的主键。Use the property to specify a comma-separated list of field names that represent the primary key of the data source. 设置属性后 , 控件将自动创建一个对象, 该对象表示当前记录的一个或多个键字段, 并将其存储在属性中。 When the property is set, the control automatically creates a object that represents the key field or fields for the current record and stores it in the property. 当属性设置为`true`时, 控件将自动确保在属性中指定的一个或多个字段是只读的。 When the property is also set to `true`, the control automatically ensures that the field or fields specified in the property are read-only. > [!NOTE] > 必须将属性设置为自动更新、删除和插入控件的功能才能工作。You must set the property for the automatic updating, deleting, and inserting features of the control to work. 如果行字段的`false` 属性设置为, 则不会在控件中显示行, 并且该行的数据不会对客户端进行往返。 If the property of a row field is set to `false`, the row is not displayed in the control and the data for the row does not make a round trip to the client. 如果希望不可见的行的数据进行往返, 请将字段名称添加到属性。If you want the data for a row that is not visible to make a round trip, add the field name to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性标识绑定到控件的数据源的键字段。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to identify the key field for the data source bound to the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定在执行编辑或插入操作后控件是返回到编辑、插入还是只读模式。 Use the property to specify whether the control returns to edit, insert, or read-only mode after an edit or insert operation is performed. 默认情况下, 控件将返回到只读模式; 但是, 您可以通过将此属性设置为适当的值, 使控件处于 "编辑" 或 "插入" 模式。By default, the control returns to read-only mode; however, you can keep the control in edit or insert mode by setting this property to the appropriate value. 下表列出了不同的模式值。The following table lists the different mode values. |模式Mode|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| |`DetailsViewMode.Edit`|控件处于编辑模式, 这允许用户更新记录的值。The control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`DetailsViewMode.Insert`|控件处于插入模式, 这允许用户向数据源添加新记录。The control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly`|控件处于只读模式, 这是正常的显示模式。The control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定在更新记录后控件应保持在编辑模式下。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the control should remain in edit mode after a record has been updated. summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象表示 控件中显式声明的行字段。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that represent the explicitly declared row fields in a control.

value.span: 一个 ，包含 控件中所有显式声明的行字段。

span.span: A that contains all explicitly declared row fields in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显式声明控件的行字段时, 这些行字段存储在属性 (集合) 中。When you explicitly declare the row fields for a control, these row fields are stored in the property (collection). 集合还允许以编程方式管理显式声明的行的集合。The collection also allows you to programmatically manage the collection of explicitly declared rows. > [!NOTE] > 显式声明的行字段可与自动生成的行字段结合使用。Explicitly declared row fields can be used in combination with automatically generated row fields. 如果同时使用这两种方法, 将首先呈现显式声明的行字段, 然后呈现自动生成的行字段。When both are used, explicitly declared row fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated row fields. 自动生成的行字段不会添加到集合中。Automatically generated row fields are not added to the collection. 不同的行字段类型确定控件中行的行为。Different row field types determine the behavior of the rows in the control. 下表显示了可以在集合中使用的不同行字段类型。The following table shows the different row field types that can be used in the collection. |行字段类型Row field type|说明Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||以文本形式显示数据源中字段的值。Displays the value of a field in a data source as text.| ||在控件中显示命令按钮。Displays a command button in the control. 这允许您显示具有自定义按钮控件的行, 如 "添加" 或 "移除" 按钮。This allows you to display a row with a custom button control, such as an Add or a Remove button.| ||在控件中显示复选框。Displays a check box in the control. 此行字段类型通常用于显示具有布尔值的字段。This row field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.| ||显示内置命令按钮, 用于在控件中执行编辑、插入或删除操作。Displays built-in command buttons to perform edit, insert, or delete operations in the control.| ||将数据源中的字段值显示为超链接。Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink. 此行字段类型允许您将第二个字段绑定到超链接的 URL。This row field type allows you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.| ||在控件中显示图像。Displays an image in the control.| ||根据指定的模板, 在控件中显示行的用户定义内容。Displays user-defined content for a row in the control according to a specified template. 此行字段类型允许您创建自定义行字段。This row field type allows you to create a custom row field.| 若要显式声明控件的行字段, 请首先将属性设置为`false`。To explicitly declare the row fields for a control, first set the property to `false`. 接下来, 在`` 控件的开始标记和结束标记之间添加开始标记和结束标记。Next, add opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 最后, 列出要在开始标记和结束``标记之间包括的行字段。Finally, list the row fields that you want to include between the opening and closing `` tags. 行字段在控件中的显示顺序与行字段在集合中的显示顺序相同。The row fields are displayed in the control in the order that the row fields appear in the collection. 尽管可以通过编程方式向集合添加行字段, 但在控件中以声明方式列出行字段并使用每个行字段的属性来显示或隐藏行字段更为容易。Although you can programmatically add row fields to the collection, it is easier to list the row fields declaratively in the control and then use the property of each row field to show or hide the row field. 如果行字段的`false` 属性设置为, 则不会在控件中显示行, 并且该行的数据不会对客户端进行往返。 If the property of a row field is set to `false`, the row is not displayed in the control and the data for the row does not make a round trip to the client. 如果希望不可见的行的数据进行往返, 请将字段名称添加到属性。If you want the data for a row that is not visible to make a round trip, add the field name to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式将行字段添加到控件的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively add row fields to the collection of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewFields#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewFields/CS/DetailsViewFieldsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewFields#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewFields/VB/DetailsViewFieldsVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在单击 控件中的某个按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a button within a control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击 控件中的按钮时, 将引发事件。The event is raised when a button within the control is clicked. 这使你可以提供一个事件处理程序, 该事件处理程序将在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 对象传递到事件处理程序, 该处理程序允许您确定所单击按钮的命令名和命令参数。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the command name and command argument of the button clicked. 若要确定当前记录的索引, 请使用属性。To determine the index of the current record, use the property. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件来处理控件中的按钮单击操作。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to handle a button click in a control. 当用户单击 "添加联系人" 按钮时, 该项将添加到控件中。When the user clicks the Add Contact button, the item is added to a control. span.span: Occurs when a record is created in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每 次在控件中创建一条记录时都会引发该事件。The event is raised each time a record is created in a control. 第一次呈现控件时, 或当用户导航到另一条记录时, 会发生这种情况。This can occur when the control is first rendered, or when the user navigates to another record. 可以使用此事件提供一个事件处理程序, 该事件处理程序将在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程 (如将自定义内容添加到行)。You can use this event to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as adding custom content to a row, whenever this event occurs. 您可以分别使用、、 或属性访问控件中的标头、表尾和页导航行。You can access the header, footer, and pager rows in the control by using the , , , or properties, respectively. 若要访问其中一个数据行, 请使用集合。To access one of the data rows, use the collection. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件来更新具有当前分页统计信息的自定义页导航行。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to update a custom pager row with current paging statistics. summary.span: 在单击 控件中的“删除”按钮时，但在删除操作之后发生。

span.span: Occurs when a Delete button within a control is clicked, but after the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击控件中的 "删除" 按钮时, 但在删除操作之后, 会引发事件。The event is raised when a Delete button within the control is clicked, but after the delete operation. 这使您可以提供一个事件处理程序, 以便在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程, 如检查删除操作的结果。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of the delete operation, whenever this event occurs. 对象传递到事件处理程序, 该处理程序允许您确定受影响的行数以及可能已发生的任何异常。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the number of rows affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 还可以通过设置属性, 指示是否已在事件处理程序中处理异常。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the property. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件在控件执行删除操作后刷新控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to refresh a control after a control performs a delete operation. 这会使控件与控件保持同步。This keeps the control synchronized with the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewComplex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewComplex/CS/detailsviewcomplexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewComplex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewComplex/VB/detailsviewcomplexvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Occurs when a Delete button within a control is clicked, but before the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击控件中的 "删除" 按钮时, 但在删除操作之前引发事件。The event is raised when a Delete button within the control is clicked, but before the delete operation. 这使您可以提供一个事件处理程序, 以便在此事件发生时执行自定义例程 (如取消删除操作)。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the delete operation, whenever this event occurs. 对象传递到事件处理程序, 该处理程序允许您确定要删除的记录的索引, 并指示应取消删除操作。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the index of the record being deleted and to indicate that the delete operation should be canceled. 若要取消删除操作, 请将属性设置`true`为。To cancel the delete operation, set the property to `true`. 如果需要, 还可以在将值传递给数据源之前操作和集合。You can also manipulate the and collections, if necessary, before the values are passed to the data source. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了当用户尝试 从控件中删除最后一项时, 如何使用事件取消删除操作。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel the delete operation if the user attempts to delete the last item from the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击控件中的 "插入" 按钮时, 但在插入操作后引发事件。The event is raised when an Insert button within the control is clicked, but after the insert operation. 这使您可以提供一个事件处理程序, 以便在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程, 如检查插入操作的结果。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of the insert operation, whenever this event occurs. 对象传递到事件处理程序, 该处理程序允许您确定受影响的行数以及可能已发生的任何异常。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the number of rows affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 还可以通过设置属性, 指示是否已在事件处理程序中处理异常。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the property. 若要在插入操作后使控件处于插入模式, 请将属性设置`true`为。To keep the control in insert mode after an insert operation, set the property to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件在控件执行插入操作后刷新控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to refresh a control after a control performs an insert operation. 这会使控件与控件保持同步。This keeps the control synchronized with the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击控件中的 "更新" 按钮时, 但在更新操作之前引发事件。The event is raised when an Update button within a control is clicked, but before the update operation. 这使您可以提供一个事件处理程序, 以便在此事件发生时执行自定义例程 (如取消更新操作)。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the update operation, whenever this event occurs. 对象传递到事件处理程序, 该处理程序允许您确定要更新的记录的索引, 并指示应取消更新操作。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the index of the record being updated and to indicate that the update operation should be canceled. 若要取消更新操作, 请将属性设置`true`为。To cancel the update operation, set the property to `true`. 如果需要, 还可以在将值传递给数据源之前操作、和集合。You can also manipulate the , , and collections, if necessary, before the values are passed to the data source. 使用这些集合的常见方法是在将用户提供的值存储到数据源之前对这些值进行 HTML 编码。A common way to use these collections is to HTML-encode the values supplied by the user before they are stored in the data source. 这有助于防止脚本注入攻击。This helps to prevent script injection attacks. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件对用户输入的值进行 HTML 编码, 然后在数据源中更新记录。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to HTML-encode the values entered by the user before a record is updated in the data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewComplex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewComplex/CS/detailsviewcomplexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewComplex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewComplex/VB/detailsviewcomplexvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用, 不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过, 控件开发人员可以重写此方法, 以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 方法用于加载以前保存的控件视图状态。 The method is used to load the previously saved view state of the control.

summary.span: 在 控件尝试在编辑、插入和只读模式之间更改时，但在更新 属性之后发生。

span.span: Occurs when a control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but after the property is updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件尝试在编辑、插入和只读模式之间更改时, 但在更新属性后, 会引发事件。 The event is raised when a control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but after the property is updated. 这使你可以提供一个事件处理程序, 该事件处理程序在此事件发生时执行自定义例程 (如将控件与其他控件同步)。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as synchronizing the control with another control, whenever this event occurs. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件在标题行中显示当前模式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to display the current mode in the header row. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewModeChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewModeChanged/CS/detailsviewmodechangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewModeChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewModeChanged/VB/detailsviewmodechangedvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Occurs when a control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the property is updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件尝试在编辑、插入和只读模式之间更改时, 但在更新属性之前, 会引发事件。 The event is raised when a control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the property is updated. 这允许你提供一个事件处理程序, 以便在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程, 如取消模式更改。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the mode change, whenever this event occurs. 对象将传递到事件处理程序, 该处理程序允许您确定新模式, 确定模式更改是用户取消编辑操作的结果, 还是取消模式更改。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the new mode, to determine whether the mode change was a result of the user canceling an edit operation, or to cancel the mode change. 若要确定新模式, 请使用属性。To determine the new mode, use the property. 若要确定模式更改是否是用户取消编辑操作的结果, 请使用属性。To determine whether the mode change was a result of the user canceling an edit operation, use the property. 您可以通过将属性设置为来`true`取消模式更改。You can cancel the mode change by setting the property to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件在控件处于编辑模式时禁用分页功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to disable the paging feature when the control is in edit mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewModeChanging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewModeChanging/CS/detailsviewmodechangingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewModeChanging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewModeChanging/VB/detailsviewmodechangingvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在加载数据绑定控件之前设置该控件的初始化状态。

span.span: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control before the control is loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于控制在页的生命周期内何时发生数据绑定。The method is used to control when data binding occurs within the life cycle of the page. 它通过设置数据绑定控件的内部初始化状态来实现此功能。It does this by setting the internal initialized state of the data-bound control. 由于控件的已初始化状态是在页面生命周期的阶段中设置的 , 因此只要在该阶段后更改控件的数据属性, 就会调用事件处理程序, 以指示控件必须重新绑定到其数据在呈现之前。Because the control's initialized state is set during the phase of the page's life cycle, the event handler is called any time a data property of the control is changed after that phase, to signal that the control must re-bind to its data before rendering. 当 HTTP 请求为回发但启用了视图状态但尚未绑定数据绑定控件时, 类会重写 `true` 方法, 以将属性设置为。The method is overridden by the class to set the property to `true` in cases where the HTTP request is a postback and view state is enabled but the data-bound control has not yet been bound. 此方案常见于控件 ( 如和) 中, 在运行时更改控件的可见性。This scenario is common with controls such as and , where the visibility of the control is changed at run time.

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes after a paging operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击控件中的页导航按钮 (其`CommandName`属性设置为 "Page" 的按钮) 时, 控件将引发事件, 但在控件处理分页操作之后。 The control raises the event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 这使你可以提供一个事件处理程序, 该事件处理程序将在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 以编程方式设置该属性时, 不会引发此事件。This event is not raised when you programmatically set the property. 页导航按钮通常位于控件的页导航行中。Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a control. 此事件通常用于使控件与控件同步, 或在分页操作后设置控件的行为。This event is often used to synchronize a control with a control or to set the behavior of the control after a paging operation. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了当用户导航到另一条记录时, 如何使用事件将返回到只读模式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to return the to read-only mode when the user navigates to another record. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewChangeMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewChangeMode/CS/detailsviewchangemodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewChangeMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewChangeMode/VB/detailsviewchangemodevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击控件中的页导航按钮 (其`CommandName`属性设置为 "Page") 时, 但在控件处理分页操作之前,控件引发事件。The control raises the event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 这使你可以提供一个事件处理程序, 该事件处理程序会在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程, 如取消分页操作。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 以编程方式设置该属性时, 不会引发此事件。This event is not raised when you programmatically set the property. 页导航按钮通常位于控件的页导航行中。Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a control. 对象传递到事件处理程序, 该处理程序允许您确定用户选择的页的索引, 并指示应取消分页操作。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the index of the page selected by the user and to indicate that the paging operation should be canceled. 若要确定用户选择的页的索引, 请使用属性。To determine the index of the page selected by the user, use the property. 若要取消分页操作, 请将 对象的属性设置为`true`。To cancel the paging operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件取消分页操作。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel a paging operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewCurrentMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCurrentMode/CS/detailsviewcurrentmodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewCurrentMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCurrentMode/VB/detailsviewcurrentmodevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可控制控件中页导航行的设置。 Use the property to control the settings of the pager row in a control. 当分页功能处于启用状态 (通过将属性设置为`true`), 并且包含允许用户导航到控件中不同记录的控件时, 将显示页导航行。The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (by setting the property to `true`) and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different records in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是, 您可以设置它返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. `Property-Subproperty`可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性, 其中`Subproperty` 是对象的一个属性 (例如`PagerSetting-Mode`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `PagerSetting-Mode`). 还可以在窗体`Property.Subproperty`中以编程方式设置属性 ( `PagerSetting.Mode`例如)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerSetting.Mode`). 常见设置通常包括页导航行的显示模式以及导航控件的自定义文本或图像。Common settings usually include the pager row's display mode and custom text or images for the navigation controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定页导航行的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the properties of the pager row. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性 (集合) 用于存储控件中的数据行。 The property (collection) is used to store the data rows in a control. 控件通过为数据源中的每个记录创建一个对象, 然后将该对象添加到集合中, 自动填充该集合。 The control automatically populates the collection by creating a object for each record in the data source and then adding the object to the collection. 此属性通常用于访问控件中的特定行或循环访问整个行集合。This property is commonly used to access a specific row in the control or to iterate though the entire collection of rows. > [!NOTE] > 只有数据行存储在集合中。Only data rows are stored in the collection. 表示页眉、页脚和页导航行的对象不包含在集合中。The objects that represent the header, footer, and pager rows are not included in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性访问控件中的数据行。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access a data row in a control. 数据行用于从控件检索字段的值。The data row is used to retrieve the value of a field from the control. summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象表示 控件中的顶部页导航行。

span.span: Gets a object that represents the top pager row in a control.

value.span: 一个 ，表示 控件中的顶部页导航行。

span.span: A that represents the top pager row in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用分页时 (通过将属性设置为`true`), 会自动在控件中显示一个名为 "页导航行" 的附加行。When paging is enabled (by setting the property to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 页导航行包含的控件允许用户导航到其他记录, 并且可以显示在控件的顶部和底部, 或者同时显示在控件的顶部和底部。The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to other records, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 使用属性以编程方式访问表示控件中的顶部页导航行的对象。 Use the property to programmatically access the object that represents the top pager row in the control. > [!NOTE] > 只有 控件在事件中创建了底部页导航行后, 属性才可用。The property is available only after the control creates the bottom pager row in the event. 当你需要以编程方式操作顶部页导航行时 (例如, 添加自定义内容时), 通常会使用此属性。This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the top pager row, for example when adding custom content. 在 呈现控件之后, 必须对属性进行任何修改; 否则,控件将覆盖所有更改。Any modification to the property must be performed after the control has been rendered; otherwise, the control will overwrite any changes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性在事件期间访问控件的顶部页导航行。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the top pager row of the control during the event. 然后 , 将用当前页码和总页数更新自定义页导航行中的两个控件。Two controls within the custom pager row are then updated with the current page number and total number of pages. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewTopPagerRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewTopPagerRow/CS/detailsviewtoppagerrowcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewTopPagerRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewTopPagerRow/VB/detailsviewtoppagerrowvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件处于编辑模式时, 使用方法以编程方式更新数据源中的当前记录。 When the control is in edit mode, use the method to programmatically update the current record in the data source. 如果需要从控件之外 (如页面上的不同控件) 更新当前记录, 通常会使用此方法。This method is commonly used when you need to update the current record from outside of the control, such as from a different control on the page. > [!NOTE] > 调用此方法时, 控件必须处于编辑模式; 否则 , 将引发异常。The control must be in edit mode when this method is called; otherwise, an exception is thrown. 若要指定在更新操作之前是否执行页验证, 请使用`causesValidation`参数。To specify whether page validation is performed before the update operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter. 调用此方法还会引发和事件。Calling this method also raises the and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定的教程系列, 请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data).
